column4: Can anyone possibly help me? I'm completely screwed here, I can't even boot my old system back up
what OS is the old system? XP?
have an XP install cd? should be able to boot from it and go into recovery console, then use fixmbr
well boot from it and in the first screen there should be an option for recovery console. do that, and then run "fixmbr", then exit/reboot from hard drive. should get you booting into windows
